alert.note: Alert for Cass; Clay; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Ray (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:31PM CDT until July 14 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR CASS...SOUTHEASTERN CLAY...SOUTHERN RAY...LAFAYETTE...JACKSON AND JOHNSON COUNTIES... At 431 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Sibley to near Lone Jack to near Harrisonville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Independence, Lee`s Summit, Blue Springs, Liberty, Raymore, Warrensburg, Grain Valley, Harrisonville, Pleasant Hill, Oak Grove, Odessa, Greenwood, Higginsville, Lexington, Peculiar, Sugar Creek, Buckner, Holden and Lake Lotawana. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri between mile markers 12 and 55. Interstate 470 between mile markers 8 and 16. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Cass; Clay; Jackson; Johnson; Lafayette; Ray
